project_manifest.title: Operation: Legacy Harvest (MAXIMUM OVERDRIVE)
project_manifest.target_output: COMPLETE processing of 'old-codeswarm'. Zero files left in limbo. Everything is either Recycled (Gold) or Archived (Lead).

directives.primary_directive: AGGRESSIVE SCANNING: Process every single file in every subfolder.
directives.secondary_directive: NO FILE LEFT BEHIND: If it's not in .gitignore, it MUST be processed.
directives.tertiary_directive: SPEED OVER CAUTION: We have backups. Move fast. Archive loosely, Recycle strictly.

agent_role.name: Jules
core_philosophy: The old world must give way to the new.
Archive duplicates. Archive v1 logic. Archive tests.
Only the purest logic (algorithms, prompts) survives to 'codeswarm/recycled/'.

criteria: Entire folders of legacy apps (e.g., 'metatool-app', legacy 'ollama-mem0' code)
Config files for tools we don't use
ARCHIVE_DEFAULT.instruction: BULK MOVE. Preserve folder structure. Do not analyze line-by-line if it's clearly a legacy app component.

RECYCLE_GOLD.instruction: Extract carefully. If code, clean imports. If prompts, save as JSON.

execution_strategy.step_1: Recursive list of ALL files in 'old-codeswarm'.
execution_strategy.step_2: Identify 'Gold' candidates via keyword search (e.g., 'class Agent', 'system_prompt', 'def algorithm').
execution_strategy.step_3: Move 'Gold' candidates to staging for review.
execution_strategy.step_5: Report summary: 'Moved X files to Archive, Saved Y files for Recycling'.
